dublin_core.dcvalue: Marion McNabb, Senior Technical Advisor, Pathfinder International, Email: mmcnabb@pathfinder.org; Farouk Jega, Pathfinder Nigeria Country Representative, Pathfinder International, Email: fjega@pathfinder.org
Kaduna and Abuja/Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria

The m4Change project launched the conditional cash transfer (CCT) scheme in 2014; this system incentivizes mothers to attend maternal health services, as well as tracks patients to ensure continued care is provided.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:16Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 m4change_mcct.pdf: 195268 bytes, checksum: 6d4e9e9e8d4bb48acd7765448bb9c18c (MD5)
Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Financial transactions and incentives, Provider work planning and scheduling, Maternal health
